mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_fault_uncivilized_behavior37 (v_fault_id, v_elevator_id, v_elevator_code, i_fault_type, dt_report_time, i_fault_message,v_address,v_fault_name) VALUES (#{faultId}, #{elevatorId}, #{elevatorCode}, #{faultType}, #{reportTime}, #{faultMessage}, #{vAddress}, #{vFaultName})
mapper.select: SELECT v_address FROM tbl_elevator WHERE v_elevator_code = #{elevatorCode} limit 1
